short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides access to advanced collaboration tools and features when using ConferenceManager with Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When conferencing with ConferenceManager and Google Chrome, the ConferenceManager Chrome Extension provides access to additional collaboration features such as document sharing, application sharing, and convenient access to Outlook address book contacts.
